metadata.dc:author: Anaya, S
Sánchez de la Nieta, M D
Blanco, J
Rivera, F
metadata.dc:description: Thyroid diseases could be associated with several renal alterations. In the present report we describe a patient with SLE with inactive renal involvement and symptomatic hypothyroidism that developed a clinical picture similar to lupus flare.
metadata.dc:title: Nefritis lúpica e hipotiroidismo.
[Lupus nephritis and hypothyroidism].
metadata.dc:publisher: Nefrologia : publicacion oficial de la Sociedad Espanola Nefrologia
